short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage and toggle your Chrome extensions with a single click or keyboard shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With E-Switch, you can streamline your browsing experience by quickly enabling or disabling your favorite extensions without navigating through Chrome's settings menu.


Features:
- One-Click Management: Quickly turn your extensions on or off with a single click from the popup menu.

- Keyboard Shortcuts: Use customizable keyboard shortcuts (default: Alt+S, Option+S on Mac) to open the Extension Toggler interface instantly.

- Customizable Interface: Choose between a dark & light mode and change the accent color to your liking (blue, green, orange or red).

- User-Friendly Design: Clean and intuitive interface designed to make extension management simple and efficient.


How to Use:
- Click the E-Switch icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the popup menu or use the keyboard shortcut (Alt+S on Windows or Option+S on Mac) to quickly access the Extension Toggler.

- Click on an extension to turn it on or off.


Simplify your Chrome browsing experience with E-Switch. Manage your extensions effortlessly and keep your browser clutter-free.
